title: LFM Serious 5's Mid/Jungle/Support
body:
Hello there Summoners. 

I am a (Currently) Diamond 3 ADC main, along with me a 100+ games Duo Support (Currently) Diamond 5, 
and we are looking for a serious Top, Mid and Jungle for a new Ranked 5's Team. 
We both have much experience in High Diamond Teams in Season 3-4. 
We are also looking for mature players only who are open to constructive criticism.  

Recruiting Plat 1+ Players only. 

Please add either of the following In-game if you're interested. 

IGN: Truesh0t
IGN: Scyther bot

Thank you.

replies.body:
ign: Seethingsin
rank: Diamond 5
position: Mid lane

General notes about me:
I am a very strong leader and looking for a very organised and serious team.
You need to change your Title if you are after a Top, Mid and Jungle
